locToScreenY

public static double locToScreenY(double orig,
                                  double coord,
                                  double res)
Converts a local Y coordinate to a screen Y coordinate.

Parameters:
res - the resolution of the screen's Y dimension
orig - the origin of the local coordinate system (assuming global origin at bottom left corner of screen)
coord - the coordinate of the object in local coordinates
Returns:
